alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 27 at 12:38AM MDT until October 27 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures in the mid to upper 20s expected. Even colder temperatures are expected over the weekend with a widespread killing freeze. * WHERE...Fort Collins, Boulder and the western suburbs of Denver, Denver, and Greeley. * WHEN...Until noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Drain outdoor irrigation systems and protect any outdoor plumbing.
